5. $(x-5)(2y+4x-6)=0\Leftrightarrow\left[\begin{array}{c}x-5=0,\\ 2y+4x-6=0.\end{array}\right.\Leftrightarrow\left[\begin{array}{c}x=5,\\ y=3-2x.\end{array}\right.$
$$% TIKZ_ID{task005-solution-fig1}
